Introduction: In addition to being a professor at Nanjing Forestry University, I am also Deputy Chair of the IUCN SSC Amphibian Specialist Group, communications officer for the International Herpetological Committee, and board member and science liaison for the Society for Conservation Biology, Asia section.
Title: 教授
